body:
In #6323 I added two package.py's that were created with an older version of spack and therefore had outdated licenses and links, as the template header for all packages is identical shouldn't Travis check this? In my case this was caught manually by @junghans 

I'd be happy to create a PR if a) this is wanted and b) someone could give me a pointer where to put it
title: Check licenses and stuff via CI
